Field Detail

quizID

private java.lang.String quizID
Constructor Detail

QuizMaker

public QuizMaker()
Method Detail

launch

public void launch()
Launch method called from Launcher class. User input determines which mode is chosen, i.e. which methods are called.

create

private void create()
Starts 'Create Mode', from which a new quiz can be made. A quiz can have a maximum of 10 questions. The user is then prompted to save or discard their new quiz - saving causes the QuizServer to write the quiz to file.

enterQuizName

private java.lang.String enterQuizName()
User input defines the quiz name. Quiz names must be between 4 and 30 characters long.

Returns:
An acceptable quiz name.

generateUniqueQuizID

private void generateUniqueQuizID(java.lang.String name)
The quiz name is used to generate a quiz ID, QuizServer side.

Parameters:
name - - the name of the quiz.

newQuestion

private void newQuestion()
Adding a new question with between 2 and 5 options inclusive. The question (a String) is sent to the QuizServer to store until the quiz is saved.

newOption

private void newOption(int optionNum)
Adding a new option. The option (a String) is sent to the QuizServer to store until the quiz is saved.

Parameters:
optionNum - - The numerical position of the option, as determined by the newQuestion() method.

setCorrect

private void setCorrect()
The correct option for the question is set. The character must be within the appropriate range. The option (a character) is sent to the QuizServer to store until the quiz is saved.

getOptions

private java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOptions()
Returns a list of options from the QuizServer.

Returns:
The List of Strings that represent the options in sequential order.

printEntireQuiz

private void printEntireQuiz(java.lang.String name)
Prints a formatted list of the entire quiz from the QuizServer. Each question is followed by its options, the correct option, and finally a line space.

saveOrDiscard

private boolean saveOrDiscard()
Asks the user whether the quiz should be saved or discarded. Saving will result in file persistence on the QuizServer.

Returns:
True if the file has been saved, false otherwise.

monitor

private void monitor()
'Monitor mode' allows the user to input a quiz ID and see either the top score or top ten scores for the quiz.

selectQuiz

private boolean selectQuiz()
The user inputs a quiz ID, which is then used as a reference to lookup a Quiz on the server. If no such quiz exists, the user can enter input again.

Returns:
True if the quiz is on the server, false otherwise.

getTop10

private void getTop10()
The top 10 Scores and the user details are formatted and retrieved from the QuizServer, and then printed client side.

getWinner

private void getWinner()
The top Score and the user details are formatted and retrieved from the QuizServer, and then printed client side.

yesNo

private boolean yesNo()
Uses user input to answer questions with a Yes/No outcome.

Returns:
'Y' keyboard input returns true, 'N' returns false.

listToString

private java.lang.String listToString(java.util.List<java.lang.String> strings)
Concatenates a List of Strings into one String.

Returns:
String, can be over multiple lines.

charToNum

private int charToNum(char c)
Converts a character into a numerical equivalent.

Parameters:
c - - Character to be converted.
Returns:
Corresponding number, or 6 if the character is out of range.

numToChar

private char numToChar(int i)
Converts a number into a character.

Parameters:
i - - Number (int) to be converted.
Returns:
Corresponding character, or 'X' if the number is out of range.
